version.diffIntegrityError: Version {{version}} is marked as Diff but missing valid source_version_id

version.parseFailed: Failed to parse valid page data, cannot create version
version.formatInvalid: Invalid version format: {{version}}. Expected x.y.z or x.y.z.h

version.crossProjectRollback: Security error: version {{versionId}} does not belong to current project {{projectUuid}}. This version belongs to project {{targetProject}}, cannot rollback.
version.securityProjectIdMissing: Security error: Project ID not provided, cannot access data to prevent cross-project leakage

xml.invalidFormat: Decoded result is not valid XML
xml.decompressFailed: Failed to decompress Base64-encoded gzipped XML. This may be due to: 1) Original data not gzipped 2) Corrupted compression data 3) Incorrect encoding format. Error: {{message}}
